list.description: Set up biometric authentication and issue your first self-attested credential
list.title: Get started with your Wallet

list.description: From their portal, Trusted Authorities and businesses can issue verifiable credentials directly to your wallet
list.title: Request a verifiable credential

list.description: Simply scan a QR code and click consent to share relevant data to prove your identity and qualifications
list.title: Access digital services

list.description: Easily manage which entities can access your data and revoke access to them anytime
list.title: Manage access to your data

firstSection.description: Meet Gataca Studio, the all-in-one platform facilitating the integration of Self-Sovereign Identity into your website or application
firstSection.title: Compliant identity verification in seconds

secondSection.description: Gataca Studio streamlines the issuance, verification, and management of identity credentials and enables 1-click onboarding and sign-in processes for your users

descriptionParagraphs: Create and digitally sign tamper - proof identity credentials, certificates, tickets, badges, and other types of personal documents according to W3C and ISO standards for global interoperability.
With Gataca Studio, you can configure end - to - end issuance processes that can be easily integrated with your own backend systems through pre - defined credential schemas and a simple interface
list.title: Issue verifiable credentials

descriptionParagraphs: Verify the authenticity of identity credentials or claims a user presents and create customizable verification processes to enhance your user's onboarding and sign-in experience.
From our platform, you decide on the authentication requirements, trust levels, and other security features to meet regulatory standards without the need to store sensitive personal data.
list.title: Verify credentials & authenticate users

descriptionParagraphs: Manage the lifecycle of issued credentials (issue, suspend, activate, and revoke) and control your base of active users (view and delete).
Gataca Studio allows you to monitor the performance of your templates and control data sharing consents from a simple dashboard.
list.title: Monitor credentials & user activity

secondSection.title: Features

list.description: Following global Internet standards so you can use them worldwide
list.title: Digitalized

list.description: Signed by Trusted Authorities so you can guarantee their authenticity
list.title: Verifiable

list.description: Protected with biometrics and strong encryption so only you control their access
list.title: Secured
